content: a cute little tree designed to **fit onto a small jar candle** a perfect way to lift a small item into something both personal and cute ideal for **teacher gifts craft fairs and secret santa** exchanges made using **amigurumi method and basic crochet stitches** 4 page written pattern beginner/intermediate level **© teri hamilton crochet@teri s 2025 this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is permitted to make items from this pattern provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited **
